subject: okay now you are fucking some blondes
body:
However far your travels take you, you will never find the girl who smiles out at you from the travel brochure.
How many things served us but yesterday as articles of faith, which today we deem but fables?
People seem not to see that their opinion of the world is also a confession of character.
A man is not old as long as he is seeking something.
When a fox preaches, take care of your geese.
Reading is a basic tool in the living of a good life.
One of the most striking signs of the decay of art is when we see its separate forms jumbled together.
There are people whose watch stops at a certain hour and who remain permanently at that age.
For precious friends hid in death's dateless night.
Eagles do not beget Doves.
Children's talent to endure stems from their ignorance of alternatives.
Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
The first faults are theirs that commit them, the second theirs that permit them.
Nothing is lasting but change nothing perpetual but death.
There's none so blind as they that won't see.
To see your drama clearly is to be liberated from it.
Capitalists are no more capable of self-sacrifice than a man is capable of lifting himself up by his own bootstraps.
The trouble with our age is that it is all signpost and no destination.
The road of life can only reveal itself as it is traveled each turn in the road reveals a surprise. Man's future is hidden.
